# uptimekuma_notification_evolution (Resource)

Evolution API notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_evolution" "example" {
  name          = "Evolution WhatsApp Notification"
  is_active     = true
  api_url       = "https://api.evolution.example.com"
  instance_name = "myinstance"
  auth_token    = "your-evolution-api-token"
  recipient     = "+551198765432"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_url` (String, Sensitive) Evolution API URL endpoint
- `auth_token` (String, Sensitive) Evolution API authentication token
- `instance_name` (String) Evolution API instance name
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `recipient` (String) Recipient phone number for WhatsApp messages

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
